abstract: Shirley S Abrahamson, liberal-leaning chief justice of the Wisconsin Supreme Court, files federal lawsuit seeking to keep her position one day after voters approve constitutional amendment likely to result in her demotion.
lead_paragraph: The move came a day after voters approved a constitutional amendment that is likely to result in the conservative majority of the Supreme Court replacing the chief justice with one of its own.

headline.main: Wisconsin Chief Justice Files a Lawsuit to Avoid Demotion
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Chief Justice Files a Lawsuit to Avoid Demotion

snippet: The move came a day after voters approved a constitutional amendment that is likely to result in the conservative majority of the Supreme Court replacing the chief justice with one of its own.
